special_powers.name: JUSTICE FOREVER
special_powers.description: When Dave Lizewski is adjacent to a friendly character with the Justice Forever keyword, modify his defense by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: BATTLEFIELD PROMOTION: TIME TO GET SERIOUS
special_powers.description: When Dave Lizewski hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a Promotion Token on his character card. You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add a 1 for each Promotion Token on his character card; On a result of 9 or higher, you may replace this character with KA2 #011 Dave Lizewski on the same click number.

special_powers.name: READY TO GO PRO
special_powers.description: When Dave Lizewski is within 6 squares of a friendly character named Hit-Girl, modify his attack and damage by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: HIT AND RUN FOR COVER
special_powers.description: Hit-Girl can use Stealth and the Move and Attack ability.

special_powers.name: OPPORTUNISTIC COMBATANT
special_powers.description: When Hit-Girl makes an attack targeting a single opposing character, if her attack total is 1 less than her target's defense value, after actions resolve, she may immediately make another attack targeting a different character as a free action.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: THE MOTHER@*$'ER
special_powers.description: Give Red-Mist a power action that does no pushing damage and replace this character with KA2 #004 Chris D'Amico on its orange starting line. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: MIST MOBILE
special_powers.description: Give Red-Mist a free action and until your next turn, he has the Vehicle symbol and becomes an autopilotted vehicle with 1 passenger and he can use the Ram ability.

special_powers.name: GET ME THE STUFF I NEED, I CAN DO THIS!
special_powers.description: Red-Mist can use Shape Change. Red-Mist can use Probability Control, but must give an action token to a friendly character when he does.

special_powers.name: RAISING AN ARMY FROM TWITTER
special_powers.description: Chris D'Amico can use Outwit and Leadership.

special_powers.name: FOR MY SISTER!
special_powers.description: When Miranda Swedlow generates knock back, it can't be ignored by powers.

special_powers.name: IT'S JUST A BAT WRAPPED IN FOIL
special_powers.description: When Dr. Gravity hits a character with a close combat attack, he can use Force Blast as a free action targeting a character he did not attack this turn.

special_powers.name: HAVING THE RIGHT STORY
special_powers.description: Battle Guy can use Perplex, but only to target other friendly characters.

special_powers.name: BRING IT ON
special_powers.description: When Mother Russia successfully hits a piloted vehicle with a ranged combat attack, deal 1 unavoidable damage to the pilot and the pilot is ejected.

special_powers.name: TIME TO STRETCH MY LEGS
special_powers.description: Mother Russia can use the Duo Attack ability, but when she does, she may only make ranged combat attacks.

special_powers.name: LITTLE GIRL
special_powers.description: Mother Russia ignores damage dealt by Blades/Claws/Fangs unless the result of the d6 roll is 5-6.

special_powers.name: ON THE STREETS, THE FIRST
special_powers.description: Any opposing character that is 4 or more squares from Dave Lizewski can't draw a line of fire to him.

special_powers.name: AN INSPIRATION
special_powers.description: Dave Lizewski can use Enhancement and Leadership.

special_powers.name: I'M ACTUALLY PRETTY GOOD AT THIS
special_powers.description: If Dave Lizewski doesn't have 2 action tokens, he can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: ON PATROL
special_powers.description: Dave Lizewski can use Charge. If Dave Lizewski is not adjacent to an opposing character, he may move 2 squares as a free action.

special_powers.name: I WAS THE FIRST
special_powers.description: Dave Lizewski can use Leadership. When he does, other characters with the Justice Forever keyword are considered a lower point value.

special_powers.name: USES HER SIZE TO HER ADVANTAGE
special_powers.description: If Hit-Girl is adjacent to an opposing character, Hit-Girl can use Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TWIN SWORDS
special_powers.description: Hit-Girl can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Flurry. When she uses Flurry, she must be given a power action instead of a close combat action.

special_powers.name: I CAN JUST PAY SOMEONE TO FIGHT MY BATTLES
special_powers.description: Chris D'Amico can use Mastermind. When he does, you may give him an action token and he can transfer damage to friendly characters regardless of their point value.

special_powers.name: THAT KID CAN MOVE
special_powers.description: Battle Guy can use Flurry and Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: LET ME JOIN!
special_powers.description: Battle Guy can use Shape Change. Adjacent friendly characters can use Close Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: 50,000 A WEEK, PLUS EXPENSES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character. That character's defense value is modified by +1 when it is adjacent to Mother Russia.

special_powers.name: CLOSE RANGE HAIL OF BULLETS
special_powers.description: When Mother Russia makes a ranged combat attack and her target is within 3 squares, you may modify her damage value by -1 and then damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: EISENHOWER
special_powers.description: Colonel Stars and Stripes may begin the game with Eisenhower attached at no cost. While Eisenhower is attached, Colonel Stars and Stripes can use the Duo Attack ability. Give Colonel Stars and Stripes a power action and place Eisenhower in an adjacent square. When you do, Eisenhower can't be given a non-free action this turn. If Eisenhower is attached when Colonel Stars and Stripes is KO'd, place Eisenhower in a square Colonel Stars and Stripes occupied.

special_powers.name: RESPECT THE MASK
special_powers.description: Colonel Stars and Stripes can use Leadership and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: SIC EM!
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named "Colonel Stars and Stripes" is within 4 squares, Eisenhower may be given a move action as a free action.
